strapiPost.title: Hillary Clinton, Condoleezza Rice To Speak In Bentonville
strapiPost.content:
In a continued effort to provide opportunities to expand understanding of the American narrative, Crystal Bridges Museum of American Art will be hosting a suite of educational programming and inspiring talks from some of the United Statesâ€™ prominent leaders. 

  • Big names: The former U.S. Secretaries of State Hilary Clinton and Condoleezza Rice, philanthropist and co-founder of The Carlyle Group David M. Rubenstein, and famed musician Yo-Yo Ma will present in-person programs at Crystal Bridges to celebrate and reflect on the historical exhibition, We the People: The Radical Notion of Democracy. 
  • Kick-off: Programming will begin over Constitution Weekend, September 16-17, and include talks, performances, art making, and gallery conversations. Some events are ticketed, while others will be free to attend. 

For more information, click HERE.
